sourcesContent:
Name : {{u.name}}
UserName : {{u.username}}

Email : {{u.email}}

Web Site
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { UsersService } from '../service/users.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-users', templateUrl: './users.component.html', styleUrls: ['./users.component.css'] }) export class UsersComponent{ user:any=[]; constructor(private users:UsersService){} ngOnInit(): void { this.getPost(); } getPost(){ this.users.getUsers().subscribe( (data:any)=>{this.user=data; }, (error)=>{ console.log(error); } ) } }
